name: Classic White Bread
description: Simple, soft white bread perfect for sandwiches and toast.
instructions: Add ingredients to bread pan in order listed.

name: Honey Wheat Bread
description: Hearty whole wheat bread sweetened with honey.
instructions: Add all ingredients to bread pan.
Select Whole Wheat cycle, medium crust.

name: French Bread
description: Crusty French-style bread with a chewy interior.
instructions: Add ingredients to pan in order.

name: Cinnamon Raisin Bread
description: Sweet bread with cinnamon swirl and plump raisins.
instructions: Add raisins at the beep/add-in signal.

name: Italian Herb Bread
description: Aromatic bread with Italian herbs and olive oil.
instructions: Add ingredients to bread pan in order listed.

name: Banana Bread
description: Moist banana bread made easy in the bread machine.

name: Oatmeal Bread
description: Soft, hearty bread with rolled oats.
instructions: Add all ingredients to bread pan.

name: Potato Bread
description: Incredibly soft bread using potato flakes.

name: Beer Bread
description: Hearty bread with a distinctive beer flavor and chewy texture.
instructions: Add beer and remaining ingredients to pan.

name: Cheese Bread
description: Rich, cheesy bread perfect as a side dish.

name: Rosemary Olive Oil Bread
description: Fragrant bread with fresh rosemary and olive oil.
instructions: Add all ingredients to bread pan.

name: Pumpernickel Bread
description: Dark, dense rye bread with cocoa and molasses.
instructions: Add ingredients to pan in order.
Select Whole Wheat cycle, dark crust.

name: Buttermilk Bread
description: Tender bread with a subtle tang from buttermilk.
instructions: Add all ingredients to bread pan.

name: Garlic Bread
description: Soft bread loaded with garlic flavor.
instructions: Add all ingredients to bread pan.

name: Sourdough Bread
description: Tangy sourdough using bread machine with starter.
instructions: Add starter and ingredients to pan.

name: Brioche Bread
description: Rich, buttery French bread with eggs.
instructions: Add wet ingredients first, then dry.

name: Multigrain Bread
description: Nutritious bread with multiple grains and seeds.
instructions: Add all ingredients to bread pan.

name: Challah Bread
description: Traditional Jewish egg bread, rich and slightly sweet.

name: Pumpkin Bread
description: Warm, spiced bread with pumpkin puree.

name: Rye Bread
description: Classic light rye with caraway seeds.

name: Sun-Dried Tomato Bread
description: Savory bread with sun-dried tomatoes and herbs.

name: Cornbread
description: Sweet cornbread made in the bread machine.
instructions: Mix wet and dry ingredients separately.

name: Pizza Dough
description: Versatile pizza dough made in the bread machine.

name: Cinnamon Swirl Bread
description: White bread with a gorgeous cinnamon sugar swirl.
instructions: Use Dough cycle for bread ingredients.
Sprinkle with brown sugar and cinnamon.
Roll up tightly, place in pan.

name: Olive Bread
description: Mediterranean bread studded with kalamata olives.

name: Egg Bread
description: Rich, golden bread with a soft crumb.

description: Unique, hearty bread with creamy peanut butter.

name: Chocolate Bread
description: Rich chocolate bread, perfect for dessert or breakfast.

name: Cranberry Walnut Bread
description: Festive bread with dried cranberries and walnuts.

Add fruit and nuts at beep.

name: Jalapeno Cheese Bread
description: Spicy cheese bread with pickled jalapenos.

name: Anadama Bread
description: Classic New England bread with cornmeal and molasses.

name: Coconut Bread

description: Savory bread with mixed herbs and Parmesan.

description: Moist bread with applesauce, raisins, and cinnamon.

description: Super soft Japanese-style milk bread (Shokupan).

description: Great sandwich bread made with soured milk.

name: Hawaiian Sweet Bread
description: Sweet, tropical bread with pineapple juice.

description: Autumn bread made with apple cider and cinnamon.

name: Honey Oat Wheat Bread
description: Wholesome bread with honey, oats, and whole wheat.

name: Dinner Rolls
description: Soft, fluffy dinner rolls from the bread machine.

name: Marble Rye Bread
description: Swirled light and dark rye in one beautiful loaf.

Roll each into rectangle, stack, and roll up.
Place in loaf pan, let rise 30 min.
